name: revenge of egg
description:
No one heeded the warnings. No one really thought this day would come. But EGG was Back! And it wanted REVENGE!

how to play

Roll east to cause as much destruction as possible. Earn currency by squashing creatures and demolishing buildings. Purchase upgrades for the E.G.G. in order to travel further. Right now there's no ending.

controls

Roll left  -   A  || Left Arrow
Roll right  -   D  || Right Arrow
Jump  -   W  ||   Space  ||  Up Arrow

project status

With two weeks left in the jam, this game is a bit unfinished. Please submit anonymous feedback here!

Here's what's left to do:
- Add an ending
- Test + improve level design
- Fix jump bug
- Title screen music track coming soon

credits

Code + Art by Ruthie Edwards

Music by Crezno

Based on Cartridge Design by Tyler Rhodes

Made for A Game By Its Cover Jam, Sept-Oct 2020.
